Home About Contributors Mastodon

Ways to contribute:

The simplest way to get up and running is to join our Mastodon community. One look at our roadmap, however, and you’ll soon see we have many big plans. These will take some time to come to fruition. If you have ideas for website content, please send me a message. Anybody can suggest improvements to our code over at Github. This includes designs, project plans, priorities, core documents (such as the code of conduct), scripts to get the draft codebase implemented - any feedback or assistance is most welcome and absolutely encouraged. Lastly we have setup as a (TBD social enterprise) and can now take donations to cover our running costs of this effort’s website, its social network, and testing and development of these roadmap plans.

Contributors

All assistance, whether donations, code snippets, content, etc. will be listed here via their expressed agreement. For website authored content, please note the following author collections:
